thread.title: "He's failed himself miserably": Furious Kim Woodburn accuses CBB's James Cosmo of being a coward
thread.title_full: "He's failed himself miserably": Furious Kim Woodburn accuses CBB's James Cosmo of being a coward

author: Lara Martin
title: "He's failed himself miserably": Furious Kim Woodburn accuses CBB's James Cosmo of being a coward
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kim Woodburn has absolutely LASHED OUT at Celebrity Big Brother housemate James Cosmo , branding him a “coward” and a “fool.” 
The How Clean Is Your House star, 74, was furious with Game of Thrones actor James, 68, in scenes aired on Wednesday night, accusing him of ganging up with the other housemates and approving of their behaviour. 
It seems she was angry that James C told her to not start after Bianca Gascoigne and Nicola McLean spoke out against her. He later said “stuff this game” and walked off when Kim began rowing with them. Kim ranted about James C in the Diary Room (Photo: Channel 5) James had told Kim not to start when a row was brewing between her, Bianca and Nicola (Photo: Channel 5) Read More "Filth! You're stupid b***hes": Kim Woodburn EXPLODES at Nicola McLean and Bianca Gasgoigne during heated CBB row 
Kim was called to the Diary Room to cool down, where she proceed to lay into James in a furious rant. 
“Bloody James. He’s got to keep in with the gang, he’s part of the gang. It wasn’t right he had to interfere at all. He’s failed himself miserably by joining a gang and he should know better at 69 years of age,” ranted Kim. 
“Rubbish. I’m disgusted with him. He said, ‘Now Kim’ but I didn’t start it! He wants to grow a set of balls and stay out of women’s work. How dare he. The gang. I won’t have it. It’s unfair and it’s rotten and if that fool James at his age doesn’t see what’s going on here. Kim accused James C of joining the housemates' gang against her Kim called James C a coward Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
